tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was consulting a gynecologist and had 1 missed abortion and one 1 miscarriage and both time my gyne asked me to go for DNC which is a surgery to clean uterus which I didn't need beacause it could have done with medicines as  well.I was upset with my miscarriages and surgeries.So I visited Dr Mamta through  some recommendation and then I came to know that i didn't need surgery and it can be done medically.I was most scared of the surgery as miscarriage was a trauma and then surgery over it was more than a trauma.She also explained to me the reasons of miscarriages and told me not to go for unnecessary hormone injections which I used to take earlier when I hwas with other gyne.She not only educated me about my frequent miscarriages but also convinced me that my next pregnancy not necessarily will turn into miscarriages.
I feel while treating a patient , patient's psychological counselling is very important rather than just treating them like a robot who has no pain no  sentiments.
 She is not only thorough with her knowledge with her skill but she also understands that every patient is a human as well and should be respected.Her expertise is holostical approach towards a problem and that is why immediately gets connected to the patient.
I would strongly recommend Dr Mamta for all your gynecological concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to her on the recommendation of my friend and I made the best decision. Dr. Mamta is a very friendly and a thorough personality. She is very confident about the things you ask her. I liked how she explained me about PCOS and the detailed check up she did. A very patient listener and the progressive mind that she has really comforted me. She listened to me without any judgements and that made me more transparent with her. I recommend her over and over again for all your gynae related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I would really like to start with a Big thanks
The issues faced by my wife post delivery were sorted to her satisfaction (which couldn't got resolved)  from previous Doctors. 

Dr. Mamta Goel gave us basics to be taken care for both baby (either it was feeding related issues)  or mother (post pregnancy issues) 

She was calm and very polite in her responses.  Made us feel comfortable and safe with her positive approach.  

Last but not the least was the Do's and Don't s details which she shared with us before and after pregnancy.. That was of great help

Thanks Dr.  For making our and baby life comfortable

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She really explained everything in good way and explained why she is advising anything. Now I am aware very well that if I go with advise what benefit/harm can happen and if not go with advise what benefit / harm can happen..
It was a nice experience.

tags: None
review: I have been visiting Dr Mamta goel since 5months. as I was trying to conceive I came and meet Dr Mamta in sci. Her professional behaviour, makes you feel less panic for your health issues. I have made my mind for delivery with her only. Thanks for support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr mamta goel for pregnancy counselling. I showed her my reports and she briefed me very positively. As my case is high risk so I can advise this to all expected mothers to have a second opinion from her.
Thanks to doctor her support Is surely bringing positivity in me.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was suffering from uncontrolled bp at the time of my pregnancy. My few friends suggested me to visit Dr mamta Goel for routine checkup. When I met her for the first time I made my mind to get admitted under her for my delivery. She forced me to go for normal delivery as I was really scared of the pain for labor pain. But all thanks to her efforts i had a normal delivery, a healthy baby boy. I can recommend this doctor to everyone. Thanks Dr mamta n team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Mamta Goel is a great doctor with expertise in her feild..She is calm and very polite in her responses..She is always available for her patients.. She made us feel comfortable and safe with her positive approach.. Would definitely recommend her to everyone..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Mamta Goel is a great gynaecologist and has helped me in every problem related to my pregnancy and my baby. She has given us her time with all the patience and has listened to us in a very proper manner. Thank you so much for all your support, Dr. Goel!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I was very happy and satisfied with my doctor. I would recommend her to every woman for her calmness and professionalism. She guided me throughout my pregnancy and was available every time, everyday. My pregnancy went very smoothly and I was very happy with the results all through my 9 months and day of my delivery and post delivery as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Labor and Delivery,Medical Termination Of Pregnancy (Mtp),
review:
Comfort level , faith &  confidence is all you need  from your Doctor.  And she has it all . 
She is never in a rush to call the next patient , she hears your case patiently and gives good advice.  
Dr Mamta is unlike the gynaecologist , she will study the case well and explain you the problem you have very well.  I have blind Faith in her and am blessed that I came across her and my delivery was a breeze with her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is guide you properly..about your current and your future health..very polite with the patient...and she ll give you full time for  consulting...all I can say...that if you need a right doctor with right knowledge...go for...dr mamta....I very much happy with her...I do my copper t done....there....very positively...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We met Dr. Mamta goel while we were searching for a doctor for my second pregnancy and we are glad that we met her.  She is very humble and supportive. Her guidence and support was what we needed in our this beautiful journey. I have visited Dr. Mamta number of times, and the way she explains the problem and possible solutions, I have never seen any doctor explain and discuss the same way. She is extremely knowledgeable and updated ! We highly recommend dr. Mamta goel for a smooth and fearless pregnancy.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I was extremely happy with my doctor, Dr. Mamta Goel and her team. I delivered my first baby girl under her guidance and supervision. I have been consulting her throughout my pregnancy and consider it the best decision I made. Since itâ€™s my first pregnancy, I was very anxious and doubtful throughout. Though I always wanted to deliver my baby normally but due to the breach presentation, I had to opt for the C-section. She was very supportive in explaining everything in detail and clear all my doubts. 

I will continue to recommend her to my friends and family.

Thanks 
Kirti

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Words fail me in acknowledging the care and support she showers on me as a patient. I indeed consider myself very fortunate to have been associated with her. The most friendly and caring doctor I have ever met in my life. The way she encourages and supports is I like most about her. She encourages you irrespective in what situation or problem you are in and provide you with all the remedies whether it will be cured medically or not. She is 24*7 available to solve my queries. Going to a doctor is mentally burdensome for everyone but with her everytime I look forward to meet her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wish I had the words to thank her. I felt very confident after discussing my problem with her. She understood my concerns and explained me very well. She is very caring and empathetic. I would highly recommend her to anyone facing gynae problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very polite and friendly doctor she is. I guess we all want such doctors who not only listens to our problem in OPD but anytime from home also she is available to answer our queries. God bless Dr mamta

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am fortunate to be one of Dr. Mamta's patients.In addition to her incredible understanding , Dr. Mamta is kind, thoughtful and patient. Thanks to her insight and care, I cannot imagine a more supportive, brilliant gynae.
